subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Dustin Pedroia had three hits and drove in five runs, and David Ortiz went 3 for 3 and had 4 runs batted in as the Red Sox beat the Baltimore Orioles.
snippet: Dustin Pedroia had three hits and drove in five runs, and David Ortiz went 3 for 3 and had 4 runs batted in as the Red Sox beat the Baltimore Orioles.
